summary: After the bizarre death of her brother, Johana Burwood must return home after four years, to face her strange siblings, her out of touch father and her very touchy past.
cast: Sarah Hyland|Bret Harrison|Steve Howey|Odeya Rush|Jake McDorman|Alex Frost|Emma Bell|Beau Mirchoff|Allie Gonino|Michael Weston|Conor O'Farrell|Jamie Wozny|Christopher T. Wood|Ariston Green|Orion Green|Amanda Holquin|Lauren Cook|Ryan Pinkston|Michael Falso|Josh Adell|Elizabeth Small|Jack Briggs|Lauryn Morse|William "Will" Daubert|A.J. Wartinger|Andrew Mabry|David Cohen|Alec Justin Henderson|Edgar Roche|Maxie Solveig|Joseph Lewis Hemming|Krystie Castro|Karli Klein|Jack Michael Doke
title: See You in Valhalla
